doc:
Lawrence Holofcener https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_Holofcener 0 Lawrence Holofcener (February 23, 1926 – March 4, 2017) was an American-British sculptor, poet, lyricist, playwright, novelist, actor and director. He held British and American dual nationality. As a singer and songwriter he was better known as Larry Holofcener. He died in March 2017 at the age of 91. As a tribute to his transatlantic love affair with England, his obituary was also published by UK's The Daily Telegraph. Lawrence_Holofcener ( February_23_,_1926 – March_4_,_2017 ) was an_American-British_sculptor , poet_,_lyricist_,_playwright_,_novelist_,_actor_and_director . He held British_and_American_dual_nationality . As a_singer_and_songwriter he was_better_known as Larry_Holofcener . He died in March_2017 at the_age of 91 . As a_tribute to his_transatlantic_love_affair with England , his_obituary was_also_published by UK 's_The_Daily_Telegraph .
